parts.name: Picture description
parts.title: For each question, you will see a picture and you will hear four short statements. The statements will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book so you must listen carefully to understand what the speaker says. When you hear the four statements, look at the picture and choose the statement that best describes what you see in the picture. Choose the best answer A, B, C or D

intro.title:
EXAMPLE:
Now listen to the four statements.
Statement (D) best describes what you see in the picture.
Therefore, you should choose answer (D).
intro.answers: ["A. He is on the phone","B. She is driving the car","C. She is typing on the computer","D. He is sitting next to her"]

questions.text_audio:

B. They’re writing on a blackboard.
C. They’re looking at a book.

parts.name: Question - response
parts.title: In this part of the test, you will hear a question or statement spoken in English, followed by three responses, also spoken in English. The question or statement and the responses will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book, so you must listen carefully. You are to choose the best response to each question or statement.

intro.title:
You will hear:
Why are you late?
intro.answers: ["A. I hope I won't be","B. My car broke down","C. He alway is"]
intro.explains: The best response is choice B. "My car broke down". Therefore, you should choose B.

questions.text_audio:

B. You can use the printer.
C. No, I have enough.

parts.name: Short conversations
parts.title: You will hear some conversations between two people. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speakers say in each conversation. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The conversations will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hello. I’m staying in room 509. (32),(33) I wanted to use the hotel’s indoor swimming pool around seven this morning, but my room key wouldn’t open the door to the pool.
M-Au: I’m sorry, but the pool’s only open between the hours of eight A.M. and eight
P.M. If you go between those times, your key should work.
W-Br: Hmm, I’m here on business, so I can only exercise early in the morning.
M-Au: Well, (34) you’re welcome to use our fitness center. It’s on the second floor and it’s open 24 hours.
W-Br: (34) Great-that will allow me to exercise before work.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Xin chào. Tôi \u0111ang \u1edf phòng 509. (32), (33) Tôi mu\u1ed1n s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i trong nhà c\u1ee7a khách s\u1ea1n vào kho\u1ea3ng b\u1ea3y gi\u1edd sáng nay, nh\u01b0ng chìa khóa phòng c\u1ee7a tôi không m\u1edf \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1eeda vào h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i.
M-Au: Tôi xin l\u1ed7i, nh\u01b0ng h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i ch\u1ec9 m\u1edf c\u1eeda t\u1eeb 8 gi\u1edd sáng \u0111\u1ebfn tám gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n \u0111i b\u01a1i trong kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian \u0111ó thì chìa khóa m\u1edbi m\u1edf.
W-Br: Hmm, tôi \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ây công tác nên ch\u1ec9 có th\u1ec3 t\u1eadp vào sáng s\u1edbm.
M-Au: (34) D\u1ea1, b\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chào \u0111ón \u1edf trung tâm th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Nó n\u1eb1m trên t\u1ea7ng hai và m\u1edf c\u1eeda 24 gi\u1edd.
W-Br: (34) Tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi. V\u1eady tôi có th\u1ec3 t\u1eadp th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi làm vi\u1ec7c r\u1ed3i.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br Thanks for meeting with me, Kenji. (35) I wanted to check to see if our
supermarket is ready for the upcoming holiday season. Any updates?
M-Cn Well, we always have a lot of calls from customers with questions about preparing their holiday meal. (36) This year we’ll be introducing something new-customers will be transferred automatically to a holiday hotline to have their questions answered.

W-Br That’s a great idea. Who’ll be answering those calls?
M-Cn (37)I was thinking of assigning it to Peter and Maria, since they have a lot of
experience. (37) I’ll go talk to them now.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n \u0111ã g\u1eb7p tôi, Kenji. (35) Tôi mu\u1ed1n ki\u1ec3m tra xem siêu th\u1ecb c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111ã s\u1eb5n sàng cho k\u1ef3 ngh\u1ec9 l\u1ec5 s\u1eafp t\u1edbi ch\u01b0a. Có b\u1ea5t kì c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt nào không?
M-Cn: Vâng, chúng tôi luôn nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u cu\u1ed9c g\u1ecdi t\u1eeb khách hàng v\u1edbi câu h\u1ecfi v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb b\u1eefa \u0103n cho ngày ngh\u1ec9 c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd. (36) N\u0103m nay, chúng tôi s\u1ebd gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u m\u1ed9t vài \u0111i\u1ec1u m\u1edbi m\u1ebb, vào d\u1ecbp l\u1ec5 khách hàng m\u1edbi s\u1ebd t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng dây nóng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3i \u0111áp các th\u1eafc m\u1eafc.
W-Br: Ý hay \u0111\u1ea5y. Th\u1ebf ai s\u1ebd tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi nh\u1eefng cu\u1ed9c g\u1ecdi \u0111ó?
M-Cn: (37) Tôi \u0111ã ngh\u0129 \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c giao nó cho Peter và Maria, vì h\u1ecd có r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u kinh nghi\u1ec7m. (37) Tôi s\u1ebd nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi h\u1ecd ngay bây gi\u1edd.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am Hi. I’m renovating a room in my house. (38) The wooden flooring’s scratched in places and I’d like to repair it. Do you have a product that I can use for that?
M-Au We have several stains to repair scratched flooring, but (39) for durability, I’d recommend the Kilgore brand. Applied properly, Kilgore products last a long time.
W-Am OK. Thanks! And how can I be sure the stain will match the floor color?
M-Au Well, it comes in all the standard wood colors. (40) I can give you some color samples to take home, so you can check before you make a purchase.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Xin chào. Tôi \u0111ang s\u1eeda l\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t c\u0103n phòng trong nhà c\u1ee7a mình. (38) Sàn g\u1ed7 b\u1ecb x\u01b0\u1edbc \u1edf nhi\u1ec1u ch\u1ed7 và tôi mu\u1ed1n s\u1eeda l\u1ea1i. B\u1ea1n có m\u1ed9t s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m nào \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eeda không?
M-Au: Chúng tôi có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ph\u1ea9m màu \u0111\u1ec3 ch\u1eefa sàn b\u1ecb tr\u1ea7y x\u01b0\u1edbc, nh\u01b0ng (39) \u0111\u1ec3 có \u0111\u1ed9 b\u1ec1n, tôi khuyên b\u1ea1n nên s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u Kilgore. Áp d\u1ee5ng \u0111úng cách, các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a Kilgore s\u1ebd có tu\u1ed5i th\u1ecd r\u1ea5t cao.
W-Am: ôi không sao. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n! Và làm th\u1ebf nào tôi có th\u1ec3 ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1eb1ng ph\u1ea9m màu s\u1ebd phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi màu sàn?
M-Au: Vâng, nó có t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các màu g\u1ed7 tiêu chu\u1ea9n. (40) Tôi có th\u1ec3 giao cho b\u1ea1n m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 m\u1eabu màu \u0111\u1ec3 mang v\u1ec1 nhà, vì v\u1eady b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 ki\u1ec3m tra tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi mua hàng.<\/p>"}

D. They are safe for the environment.<\/p>

Information: For durability, I’d recommend the Kilgore brand.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn Hello,(41) I’m interested in the legal services your firm offers. I own some cafes, and (42) one of my competitors just put his coffee shop up for sale. I’m planning to buy it, but I want to avoid any mistakes in the contract.
W-Am Of course. We have several qualified contract attorneys on staff. Let me set up a time for you to come into the office this week to talk with one of our lawyers.
M-Cn Great. But (43) would it be possible to have the meeting online? I’ll be away in San Diego the next few days for a relative’s wedding.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Xin chào, (41) Tôi quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn các d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 pháp lý c\u1ee7a công ty b\u1ea1n. Tôi s\u1edf h\u1eefu m\u1ed9t vài quán cà phê, và (42) m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1ed1i th\u1ee7 c\u1ea1nh tranh c\u1ee7a tôi v\u1eeba \u0111\u0103ng bán quán cà phê c\u1ee7a anh ta. Tôi \u0111ang \u0111\u1ecbnh mua nó, nh\u01b0ng không mu\u1ed1n g\u1eb7p bât kì sai sót nào trong h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng.
W-Am: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi. Chúng tôi có nhi\u1ec1u lu\u1eadt s\u01b0 có trình \u0111\u1ed9 v\u1ec1 v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng. \u0110\u1ec3 tôi s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp th\u1eddi gian cho b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng trong tu\u1ea7n này \u0111\u1ec3 nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t trong s\u1ed1 h\u1ecd.
M-CN: Tuy\u1ec7t, (43) nh\u01b0ng li\u1ec7u có t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c cu\u1ed9c g\u1eb7p m\u1eb7t tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn không? Vài ngày t\u1edbi tôi s\u1ebd \u0111i San Diego \u0111\u1ec3 d\u1ef1 \u0111ám c\u01b0\u1edbi c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd hàng.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au (44) Mariko, Kenichi-welcome to your first day of work at Willow Hospital. We’re glad to have experienced nursing assistants like you join our staff. Today we’ll go over hospital policies and procedures. Any questions before we start?
M-Cn I have one. After today, will we need identification badges to get into the building?
M-Au Yes. (45) We’II be heading to the security center later today to get them.
W-Br (46) And is there a designated parking area for staff?
M-Au Yes. Employees should use the West Parking Area only.
W-Br OK, thanks.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au (44) Mariko, Kenichi-chào m\u1eebng các b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi ngày \u0111\u1ea7u tiên làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1ea1i B\u1ec7nh vi\u1ec7n Willow. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi có nh\u1eefng nhân viên \u0111i\u1ec1u d\u01b0\u1ee1ng giàu kinh nghi\u1ec7m nh\u01b0 các b\u1ea1n tham gia vào \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Hôm nay chúng ta s\u1ebd xem xét các chính sách và th\u1ee7 t\u1ee5c c\u1ee7a b\u1ec7nh vi\u1ec7n. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi chúng ta b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u, các b\u1ea1n có câu h\u1ecfi nào không?
M-Cn Tôi có m\u1ed9t câu h\u1ecfi. Sau ngày hôm nay, chúng tôi có c\u1ea7n th\u1ebb nhân viên \u0111\u1ec3 vào tòa nhà không?
M-Au Có. (45) Chúng tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn trung tâm b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 vào cu\u1ed1i ngày hôm nay \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1ea5y chúng.
W-Br (46) Và có khu v\u1ef1c \u0111\u1eadu xe dành riêng cho nhân viên không?
M-Au Có. Nhân viên ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng Khu v\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ed7 xe phía Tây.
W-Br Vâng, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n anh.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am Juan, sorry to interrupt you, (47,49) but there’s something wrong with the electronic locks for Eun-Hee’s office and the meeting room next to it. Whenever you lock one of the rooms, the other one gets locked too.
M-Cn Really? (47) It should already be fixed. (49) EunHee told me about it last week, so (48) I had one of my maintenance crew change the wiring over the weekend.
W-Am I was there this morning. Would you mind going to the meeting room now and taking a look?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am Juan, xin l\u1ed7i vì \u0111ã làm phi\u1ec1n, (47,49) nh\u01b0ng \u1ed5 khóa \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u1ee7a v\u0103n phòng Eun-Hee và phòng h\u1ecdp bên c\u1ea1nh \u0111ã x\u1ea3y ra s\u1ef1 c\u1ed1. B\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 khi nào b\u1ea1n khóa m\u1ed9t trong 2 phòng, phòng còn l\u1ea1i c\u0169ng s\u1ebd b\u1ecb khóa.
M-Cn Th\u1eadt không? (47) L\u1ebd ra nó ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eeda r\u1ed3i ch\u1ee9. (49) EunHee \u0111ã nói v\u1edbi tôi v\u1ec1 \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc, vì v\u1eady (48) tôi \u0111ã yêu c\u1ea7u m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng nhóm b\u1ea3o trì c\u1ee7a tôi thay dây vào cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n.
W-Am Tôi \u0111ã \u1edf \u0111ó sáng nay. N\u1ebfu không phi\u1ec1n b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn phòng h\u1ecdp và xem qua không?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br Hi, Laura. Did you hear the news? (50) 0ur company ordered adjustable desks for all of the employees here. This way we can work either standing or sitting.
W-Am I’m happy to hear that.  jus (51) I read an article about adjustable desks. It said that standing at work is good for people’s health.
W-Br That’s right. (51) Standing more often is definitely good for your back. I wonder when the new desks will be delivered.
W-Am Let’s ask Min-Soo. He’s in Purchasing and he might know.
W-Br Min-Soo (52) Laura and I were wondering when the new standing desks will arrive?
M-Cn I was just looking at the delivery order. They should be here next week.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br Này Laura. Bi\u1ebft tin gì ch\u01b0a? (50) Công ty c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t bàn làm vi\u1ec7c có tính n\u0103ng \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh cho toàn b\u1ed9 nhân viên. V\u1eady thì chúng ta có th\u1ec3 làm vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1ee9ng ho\u1eb7c ng\u1ed3i tùy thích.
W-Am Tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi bi\u1ebft \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó. (51) Tôi \u0111\u1ecdc m\u1ed9t bài báo v\u1ec1 bàn có \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh. Nó nói r\u1eb1ng \u0111\u1ee9ng t\u1ea1i n\u01a1i làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1ed1t cho s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe c\u1ee7a m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi.
W-Br \u0110úng v\u1eady. (51) \u0110\u1ee9ng nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn s\u1ebd t\u1ed1t cho l\u01b0ng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Tôi t\u1ef1 h\u1ecfi khi nào bàn m\u1edbi s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao.
W-Am Hãy h\u1ecfi Min-Soo. Anh \u1ea5y \u0111ang mua hàng và anh \u1ea5y ch\u1eafc s\u1ebd bi\u1ebft.
W-Br Min-Soo (52) Laura và tôi \u0111ã t\u1ef1 h\u1ecfi khi nào thì bàn làm vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1ee9ng s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn?
M-Cn Tôi \u0111ang xem \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng. H\u1ecd s\u1ebd \u1edf \u0111ây vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi.<\/p>"}

D. Kì ngh\u1ec9 l\u1ec5 s\u1eafp t\u1edbi<\/p>

###<\/p>

Thông tin: Laura and I were wondering when the new standing desks will arrive?<\/p>","en":"

A. A budget<\/p>

B. A delivery date<\/p>

D. An upcoming holiday<\/p>

###<\/p>

Information: Laura and I were wondering when the new standing desks will arrive?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am Jian, (53) I was on a conference call and missed the meeting earlier today. Could you tell me what I missed?
M-Cn Sure. (54)There was an announcement about an upcoming software update. The  software that we use to track orders from packaging to shipping will change considerably after next month.
W-Am That’s soon! I wish I had been there to hear the information.
M-Cn (55) I have a copy of the presentation slides they showed at the meeting. I’ll e-mail
them to you.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am Jian, (53) Hôm nay tôi \u0111ang có m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb và \u0111ã b\u1ecf l\u1ee1 cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó. Anh có th\u1ec3 cho tôi bi\u1ebft tôi \u0111ã b\u1ecf l\u1ee1 nh\u1eefng gì không?
M-Cn Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. (54) \u0110ã có thông báo v\u1ec1 b\u1ea3n c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m s\u1eafp t\u1edbi. Ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m mà chúng ta s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u1ec3 theo dõi \u0111\u01a1n hàng t\u1eeb khâu \u0111óng gói \u0111\u1ebfn khâu v\u1eadn chuy\u1ec3n s\u1ebd thay \u0111\u1ed5i \u0111áng k\u1ec3 sau tháng t\u1edbi.
W-Am: Nhanh quá! \u01af\u1edbc gì tôi \u0111ã \u1edf \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec3 nghe thông tin c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3.
M-Cn (55) Tôi có m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n sao c\u1ee7a các slide thuy\u1ebft trình mà h\u1ecd \u0111ã trình chi\u1ebfu t\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp. Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eedi e-mail cho cô.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au Indira, (56) do you have the sales figures from all our stores? Our meeting with Lian is in half an hour.
W-Am It’s not on Thursday?
M-Au Lian sent a new meeting request late last night. She had to change our meeting
because she’s going out of town.
W-Am Oh no! I don’t have our sales information ready yet. (57) I’ve been having problems with my computer all morning, so technical support is looking at it now. I can’t access the data.
M-Au Hmm-well, (58) I’ll ask Lian if we can meet when she comes back.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au Indira, (56) b\u1ea1n có s\u1ed1 li\u1ec7u bán hàng t\u1eeb t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các c\u1eeda hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta không? Cu\u1ed9c g\u1eb7p c\u1ee7a chúng ta v\u1edbi Lian s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra trong n\u1eeda gi\u1edd n\u1eefa.
W-Am Không ph\u1ea3i là vào th\u1ee9 N\u0103m sao?
M-Au \u0110êm qua Lian \u0111ã g\u1eedi m\u1ed9t yêu c\u1ea7u cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp m\u1edbi. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã ph\u1ea3i thay \u0111\u1ed5i cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp c\u1ee7a chúng ta vì cô \u1ea5y s\u1eafp có vi\u1ec7c ra kh\u1ecfi th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n.
W- Am Ôi, không! Tôi ch\u01b0a có thông tin v\u1ec1 doanh s\u1ed1 bán hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta. (57) Tôi \u0111ã g\u1eb7p s\u1ef1 c\u1ed1 v\u1edbi máy tính c\u1ee7a mình c\u1ea3 bu\u1ed5i sáng, vì v\u1eady b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt \u0111ang xem xét v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này. Tôi không th\u1ec3 truy c\u1eadp d\u1eef li\u1ec7u.
M-Au Hmm-well, (58) Tôi s\u1ebd h\u1ecfi Lian li\u1ec7u chúng ta có th\u1ec3 g\u1eb7p nhau khi cô \u1ea5y quay l\u1ea1i không.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn Congratulations on your new position as video director! I was surprised to hear
about that position. (59) Since we’re an art supply store, I didn’t realize we needed a
video director.
W-Br Thanks. I know; it’s a bit of an unusual position, isn’t it? But with Internet
shopping becoming more popular, stores really need to have a large Internet
presence. (60) I’ll be in charge of creating how-to videos that’ll be posted online.
M-Cn That makes sense. And it sounds very interesting! What’s your current project?
W-Br Well, we’ve just filmed the first video on how to make your own beaded necklace.
It’s on our Website. Actually … (61) could you tell me what you think of it?
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn Chúc m\u1eebng b\u1ea1n \u0111ã \u0111\u1ea3m nh\u1eadn v\u1ecb trí \u0111\u1ea1o di\u1ec5n video! Tôi \u0111ã r\u1ea5t ng\u1ea1c nhiên khi nghe v\u1ec1 v\u1ecb trí \u0111ó. (59) Vì chúng tôi là m\u1ed9t c\u1eeda hàng ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt, tôi không ngh\u0129 r\u1eb1ng mình c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ea1o di\u1ec5n video.
W-Br C\u1ea3m \u01a1n. Tôi bi\u1ebft, v\u1ecb trí \u0111ó h\u01a1i khác th\u01b0\u1eddng, ph\u1ea3i không? Nh\u01b0ng vi\u1ec7c mua s\u1eafm trên Internet ngày càng tr\u1edf nên ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn, thì s\u1ef1 hi\u1ec7n di\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a các c\u1eeda hàng trên Internet càng c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft. (60) Tôi s\u1ebd ph\u1ee5 trách t\u1ea1o các video h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng t\u1ea3i.
M-Cn H\u1ee3p lý. Nghe v\u1ebb r\u1ea5t thú v\u1ecb! D\u1ef1 án hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n là gì?
W-Br Chúng tôi v\u1eeba quay video \u0111\u1ea7u tiên v\u1ec1 cách làm vòng chu\u1ed7i h\u1ea1t c\u1ee7a riêng mình. Nó có trên Trang web c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Ti\u1ec7n th\u1ec3 (61) b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 cho tôi bi\u1ebft b\u1ea1n ngh\u0129 gì v\u1ec1 nó không?<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am Excuse me. Do you work here at the mall?
M-Cn Yes, I’m a security guard here. How can I help you?
W-Am Well, (62) I’m looking for the shoe store. I need to return a pair of shoes
I bought online.
M-Cn Sure. Let’s look at the mall directory. OK, (63) we’re here, next to The Blue
Hut. Just go straight past the fountain. The shoe store is right across from the food court.
W-Am OK. Thank you.
M-Cn Also, (64) the mall is closing in about twenty minutes, so just be mindful of the time.
W-Am I will. Thanks for the reminder.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-AM Xin l\u1ed7i, anh có ph\u1ea3i nhân viên c\u1ee7a trung tâm mua s\u1eafm không?
M-Cn Vâng, tôi là nhân viên b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 \u1edf \u0111ây. Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho cô?
W-Am (62) Tôi \u0111ang tìm c\u1eeda hàng giày. Tôi c\u1ea7n tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t \u0111ôi giày mà tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t qua m\u1ea1ng.
M-Cn \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i. Hãy xem s\u01a1 \u0111\u1ed3 trung tâm mua s\u1eafm. OK, (63) chúng ta \u0111ang \u1edf \u0111ây, bên c\u1ea1nh The Blue Hut. Ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n \u0111i th\u1eb3ng qua \u0111ài phun n\u01b0\u1edbc, c\u1eeda hàng giày n\u1eb1m ngay \u0111\u1ed1i di\u1ec7n v\u1edbi khu \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c.
W-Am Vâng, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n anh
M-Cn Thêm n\u1eefa,(64) trung tâm mua s\u1eafm s\u1ebd \u0111óng c\u1eeda trong kho\u1ea3ng hai m\u01b0\u01a1i phút n\u1eefa, vì v\u1eady hãy l\u01b0u ý \u0111\u1ebfn th\u1eddi gian.
W-Am Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ec3 ý. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n anh vì \u0111ã nh\u1eafc nh\u1edf.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au Good morning, (65) welcome to the Grafton Art Museum. How can I help you?
W-Br I’ll take one regular ticket, please. I’m here in the city on a business trip. I thought (66) I’d stop by before my meetings to see your portrait collection.
M·Au OK- (66) that’II be five dollars.
W-Br Hmm … I thought it would be more … Oh, I see.
M·Au Right. And if you’re interested, (67) we have a guest speaker talking  about art restoration in the auditorium. It’s just about to start.
W-Br Great, (67) I’ll go there now. Where’s the auditorium?
M·Au It’s just at the end of this hallway.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au Chào bu\u1ed5i sáng, (65) chào m\u1eebng b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi B\u1ea3o tàng Ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt Grafton. Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho b\u1ea1n?
W-Br Vui lòng l\u1ea5y cho tôi m\u1ed9t vé tiêu chu\u1ea9n. Tôi \u0111\u1ebfn thành ph\u1ed1 này vì có m\u1ed9t chuy\u1ebfn công tác. Tôi ngh\u0129 (66) tr\u01b0\u1edbc cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp tôi s\u1ebd ghé qua \u0111\u1ec3 xem b\u1ed9 s\u01b0u t\u1eadp chân dung c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.
M-Au OK,(66) giá vé là n\u0103m \u0111ô la.
W-Br Hmm… Tôi ngh\u0129 vé s\u1ebd \u0111\u1eaft h\u01a1n… \u1ed2, tôi hi\u1ec3u r\u1ed3i.
M-Au Vâng. Và n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n quan tâm, (67) chúng tôi có m\u1ed9t di\u1ec5n gi\u1ea3 khách m\u1eddi nói v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c khôi ph\u1ee5c ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt trong khán phòng. Nó s\u1eafp b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u r\u1ed3i.
W-Br Tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi, (67) Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ó ngay bây gi\u1edd. Thính phòng \u1edf \u0111âu?
M-Au Nó \u1edf cu\u1ed1i hành lang này.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn Lena, do you have a minute? (68) Remember how we discussed creating an
e-learning course for the new real estate software?
W-Br Yes, (68) that way our real estate agents will learn how to use it  quickly.
M-Cn So, I found a company that can actually design the course for us-here’s their
design process.
W-Br OK, but how can we be sure it’ll be exactly what we’re looking for?
M-Cn (69) They won’t charge us any money until we’ve approved the prototype version. I can show you more if you have time.
W-Br I’d like that. But not now. (70) I have to finalize the sale of that commercial  property on Pine Street in ten minutes.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn Lena, b\u1ea1n có r\u1ea3nh không? (68) Còn nh\u1edb nh\u1edb chúng ta \u0111ã th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t khóa h\u1ecdc e-learning cho ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m b\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n m\u1edbi ch\u1ee9?
W-Br Có, (68) theo \u0111ó các \u0111\u1ea1i lý b\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n c\u1ee7a chúng tôi s\u1ebd h\u1ecdc cách s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nó m\u1ed9t cách nhanh chóng.
M-Cn Tôi \u0111ã tìm th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t công ty th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 có th\u1ec3 thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf khóa h\u1ecdc cho chúng ta, \u0111ây là quy trình thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd.
W-Br OK, nh\u01b0ng làm th\u1ebf nào chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1eb1ng \u0111ó s\u1ebd là chính xác nh\u1eefng gì chúng ta \u0111ang tìm ki\u1ebfm?
M-Cn (69) H\u1ecd s\u1ebd không tính phí chúng tôi b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 kho\u1ea3n ti\u1ec1n nào cho \u0111\u1ebfn khi chúng tôi phê duy\u1ec7t phiên b\u1ea3n nguyên m\u1eabu. Tôi s\u1ebd nói b\u1ea1n nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n n\u1ebfu có th\u1eddi gian.
W-Br Tôi thích \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó. Nh\u01b0ng không ph\u1ea3i bây gi\u1edd. (70) Tôi ph\u1ea3i hoàn t\u1ea5t vi\u1ec7c bán b\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i trên Ph\u1ed1 Pine sau m\u01b0\u1eddi phút.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Short talks
parts.title: You will hear some talks given by a single speaker. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speaker says in each talk. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The talks will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio: Hi, everyone. (71) I’m Stephen Anderson, the head of maintenance here at Kelson Pharmaceuticals. Yesterday evening, a pipe in the lobby broke, causing some flooding and water damage to the floor. (72) Starting today, we’ll have some workers here fixing the pipes and replacing the flooring. They may need to turn off the water during the repairs- but only for a few minutes at a time. (73) We have bottled water on hand for anyone who needs it. The bottles will be available near the water fountains.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi. (71) Tôi là Stephen Anderson, tr\u01b0\u1edfng b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn b\u1ea3o trì c\u1ee7a Kelson Pharmaceuticals. Chi\u1ec1u t\u1ed1i hôm qua, m\u1ed9t \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u1ed1ng \u1edf s\u1ea3nh \u0111ã b\u1ecb v\u1ee1, gây ng\u1eadp l\u1ee5t và n\u01b0\u1edbc \u1edf sàn nhà. (72) B\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb hôm nay, chúng tôi s\u1ebd có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 công nhân \u1edf \u0111ây s\u1eeda các \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u1ed1ng và thay th\u1ebf sàn. H\u1ecd có th\u1ec3 c\u1ea7n t\u1eaft n\u01b0\u1edbc trong khi s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa - nh\u01b0ng m\u1ed7i l\u1ea7n ch\u1ec9 vài phút. (73) Chúng tôi có s\u1eb5n n\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111óng chai cho b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 ai c\u1ea7n. G\u1ea7n các \u0111ài phun n\u01b0\u1edbc s\u1ebd có s\u1eb5n các chai n\u01b0\u1edbc.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: (74) Welcome to Green Speed Flight School. My name is Judy Overby, and I’ll be leading you on today’s tour for prospective students. To begin, thank you for considering enrolling in our program. (75) We’re proud to be one of the oldest flight schools in the country. Throughout our many years in business, our school has maintained a reputation of producing top pilots. Now, (76) let’s go to the auditorium, where you’ll see a brief informational video. The film includes interviews with some of our current instructors and students, so I’m sure you’ll find it helpful.
questions.text_audio_trans: {"vn":"(74) Chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Tr\u01b0\u1eddng Green Speed Flight. Tên tôi là Judy Overby và tôi s\u1ebd d\u1eabn chuy\u1ebfn tham quan dành cho sinh viên t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc h\u1ebft, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã \u0111\u0103ng kí tham gia ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. (75) Chúng tôi t\u1ef1 hào là m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng tr\u01b0\u1eddng d\u1ea1y lái máy bay lâu \u0111\u1eddi nh\u1ea5t trong c\u1ea3 n\u01b0\u1edbc. Trong su\u1ed1t nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m kinh doanh, tr\u01b0\u1eddng chúng tôi \u0111ã duy trì danh ti\u1ebfng là n\u01a1i \u0111ào t\u1ea1o ra nh\u1eefng phi công hàng \u0111\u1ea7u. Bây gi\u1edd, (76) chúng ta hãy \u0111\u1ebfn khán phòng b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t video gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u ng\u1eafn g\u1ecdn các thông tin. Nó bao g\u1ed3m các cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 giáo viên và sinh viên hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, vì v\u1eady tôi ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1eb1ng b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd th\u1ea5y nó h\u1eefu ích.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Good morning, Ms. Rowe. (77) Thank you for coming in for this interview to be an assistant chef at our restaurant. In reviewing your resume,nI noticed that you were a chef at The Lamplight Restaurant for two years. That restaurant has always gotten great reviews. (78) I’m interested in hearing about your role in developing the menu there. I know their menu focused on using local, organic ingredients, which we’d like to do here. And, (79) after the interview, I’ll show you around the kitchen and dining area.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào bu\u1ed5i sáng, Rowe. (77) C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn tham gia cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n này \u0111\u1ec3 tr\u1edf thành ph\u1ee5 b\u1ebfp t\u1ea1i nhà hàng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Khi xem l\u1ea1i s\u01a1 y\u1ebfu lý l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, tôi nh\u1eadn th\u1ea5y r\u1eb1ng b\u1ea1n \u0111ã làm \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp t\u1ea1i Nhà hàng The Lamplight trong hai n\u0103m. Nhà hàng \u0111ó \u0111ã luôn nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eefng \u0111ánh giá tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi. (78) Tôi mu\u1ed1n bi\u1ebft v\u1ec1 vai trò c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n trong vi\u1ec7c phát tri\u1ec3n th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n \u1edf \u0111ó. Tôi bi\u1ebft th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd t\u1eadp trung vào vi\u1ec7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng các nguyên li\u1ec7u h\u1eefu c\u01a1 và có tính \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng mà chúng tôi \u0111ang r\u1ea5t c\u1ea7n. Và (79) sau cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n, tôi s\u1ebd ch\u1ec9 cho b\u1ea1n xung quanh nhà b\u1ebfp và khu v\u1ef1c \u0103n u\u1ed1ng.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: (80) Today’s top local news story is the annual holiday festival in the Pennington city center area from one to four P.M. this afternoon. There will be arts and crafts vendors, food stalls, musical performances, and many more fun activities. (81) For detailed information about the schedule of events, including musical performances, please visit the city’s Web site at http://www.penningtoncity.org. (82) We expect a lot of visitors today, so car traffic in town will be congested. If you’re traveling to the city center, there are several bus lines.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

(80) Tin t\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng hàng \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a ngày hôm nay là kì ngh\u1ec9 l\u1ec5n hàng n\u0103m \u1edf trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1 Pennington t\u1eeb m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1ed1n gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u. Chi\u1ec1u nay s\u1ebd có các nhà cung c\u1ea5p hàng th\u1ee7 công và ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt, qu\u1ea7y hàng \u0103n u\u1ed1ng, bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n âm nh\u1ea1c và nhi\u1ec1u ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng vui ch\u01a1i khác. (81) \u0110\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft thông tin chi ti\u1ebft v\u1ec1 l\u1ecbch trình c\u1ee7a các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n, bao g\u1ed3m c\u1ea3 các bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n âm nh\u1ea1c, vui lòng truy c\u1eadp trang Web c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1 t\u1ea1i http:\/\/www.penningtoncity.org. (82) Chúng tôi d\u1ef1 \u0111oán hôm nay s\u1ebd có r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u du khách, vì v\u1eady giao thông xe h\u01a1i trong th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n s\u1ebd b\u1ecb t\u1eafc ngh\u1ebdn. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n \u0111ang di chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1, hãy cân nh\u1eafc \u0111i xe buýt.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Welcome, everyone. (83) In today’s seminar, I’ll be talking about how to use e-mail marketing to build customer relationships. We’ll cover how an effective e-mail strategy can make customers more aware of your business. After the session is over, (84) I recommend that you visit my Web site, where you can download an electronic version of the book I just published on successful marketing campaigns. So, since we have a small group today, (85) I’d like to begin by having everyone introduce themselves. Please tell us your name and what you’re hoping to take away from today’s session.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào m\u1eebng các b\u1ea1n. (83) Trong bu\u1ed5i h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o hôm nay, tôi s\u1ebd nói v\u1ec1 cách ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb qua th\u01b0 \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed \u0111\u1ec3 xây d\u1ef1ng m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi khách hàng. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp \u0111\u1ebfn cách mà m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c e-mail hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 có th\u1ec3 khi\u1ebfn khách hàng bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn doanh nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n. Sau khi phiên h\u1ecdp k\u1ebft thúc, (84) Tôi khuyên b\u1ea1n nên truy c\u1eadp trang Web c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111\u1ec3 có th\u1ec3 t\u1ea3i xu\u1ed1ng phiên b\u1ea3n \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u1ee7a cu\u1ed1n sách tôi v\u1eeba xu\u1ea5t b\u1ea3n v\u1ec1 các chi\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb thành công. Hôm nay chúng ta có m\u1ed9t nhóm nh\u1ecf, (85) tôi mu\u1ed1n b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1eb1ng cách \u0111\u1ec3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi t\u1ef1 gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u v\u1ec1 b\u1ea3n thân. Vui lòng cho chúng tôi bi\u1ebft tên c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n và nh\u1eefng gì b\u1ea1n hy v\u1ecdng s\u1ebd thu \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1eeb bu\u1ed5i h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o hôm nay.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Good afternoon. (86) This message is for the owner of Fresh and Healthy Market. My name is Kerry Yamada, and I visited your shop for the first time last week. (87) I own an orchard-we grow mainly apples and pears. We’re located nearby, on State Route 25. Anyway, (87) when I was at your shop, you didn’t have a large supply of apples. So I was wondering … do you carry local fruit? If you’re interested, (88) I can drop off a few samples of different varieties for you to taste. I’m coming back into town tomorrow. My number is 555-0132.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ec1u vui v\u1ebb. (86) Thông \u0111i\u1ec7p này dành cho ch\u1ee7 s\u1edf h\u1eefu c\u1ee7a Fresh and Healthy Market. Tên tôi là Kerry Yamada, và tôi \u0111ã ghé th\u0103m c\u1eeda hàng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc. (87) Tôi s\u1edf h\u1eefu m\u1ed9t v\u01b0\u1eddn cây \u0103n qu\u1ea3 - chúng tôi ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu tr\u1ed3ng táo và lê. Chúng tôi \u1edf g\u1ea7n \u0111ó, trên Qu\u1ed1c l\u1ed9 25. (87) Khi ghé c\u1eeda hàng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, tôi th\u1ea5y b\u1ea1n không có ngu\u1ed3n cung c\u1ea5p táo s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u1edbn . Vì v\u1eady, tôi \u0111ã t\u1ef1 h\u1ecfi b\u1ea1n có mu\u1ed1n trái cây \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng không? N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n quan tâm, (88) Tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0a ra m\u1ed9t vài m\u1eabu c\u1ee7a các gi\u1ed1ng khác nhau \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea1n n\u1ebfm th\u1eed. Tôi s\u1ebd tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n vào ngày mai. S\u1ed1 c\u1ee7a tôi là 555-0132.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Good morning, and (89) welcome to today’s workshop for hotel staff. (90) Today I’m going to demonstrate a new product we purchased here at the hotel for training employees. It’s a video game, and it was developed especially to practice the best ways for handling hotel guests’ requests and complaints. You might wonder why we’re using a video game for this instead of our usual roleplaying techniques. Well, (91) studies have shown that one of the major benefits of using these games is significant improvement in customer service.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào bu\u1ed5i sáng và (89) chào m\u1eebng b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o dành cho nhân viên khách s\u1ea1n ngày. (90) Hôm nay, tôi s\u1ebd gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u m\u1ed9t s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m m\u1edbi mà chúng tôi \u0111ã mua t\u1ea1i khách s\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111ào t\u1ea1o nhân viên. \u0110ây là m\u1ed9t trò ch\u01a1i \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed và nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phát tri\u1ec3n \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ec3 tìm ra nh\u1eefng cách t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t x\u1eed lý các yêu c\u1ea7u và khi\u1ebfu n\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a khách khách s\u1ea1n. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 th\u1eafc m\u1eafc t\u1ea1i sao chúng tôi l\u1ea1i s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng trò ch\u01a1i \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed cho vi\u1ec7c này thay vì các k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt thông th\u01b0\u1eddng. (91) Các nghiên c\u1ee9u \u0111ã ch\u1ec9 ra r\u1eb1ng s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng các trò ch\u01a1i này có th\u1ec3 c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khách hàng m\u1ed9t cách \u0111áng k\u1ec3.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: To start this department meeting, (92) I want to discuss a change on the information technology team. Ines, who’s been helping us for the past year, has been promoted. She’s taking on a leadership position within IT (93) I have a card to congratulate her, and I’d like for all of us to sign it after the meeting. We’ll certainly miss Ines. She’s the specialist who developed most of the software we all use currently. (94) The new specialist will be Tony. He hasn’t worked with our department before, but he does have fourteen years of experience.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn, (92) tôi mu\u1ed1n bàn v\u1ec1 s\u1ef1 thay \u0111\u1ed5i trong nhóm công ngh\u1ec7 thông tin. Ines, ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã giúp \u0111\u1ee1 chúng ta trong n\u0103m qua, \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u0103ng ch\u1ee9c. Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ang \u0111\u1ea3m nh\u1eadn v\u1ecb trí lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o trong IT (93) Tôi có m\u1ed9t t\u1ea5m thi\u1ec7p \u0111\u1ec3 chúc m\u1eebng cô \u1ea5y và tôi mu\u1ed1n t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 chúng ta cùng ký tên sau cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp. Chúng tôi ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn s\u1ebd nh\u1edb Ines. Cô \u1ea5y là chuyên gia \u0111ã phát tri\u1ec3n h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m mà t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 chúng ta \u0111ang s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng hi\u1ec7n nay. (94) Chuyên gia m\u1edbi s\u1ebd là Tony. Anh \u1ea5y ch\u01b0a t\u1eebng làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn c\u1ee7a chúng ta tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây, nh\u01b0ng anh \u1ea5y có m\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ed1n n\u0103m kinh nghi\u1ec7m.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Attention all customers. If you’re looking for a quick meal solution, stop by our prepared food section for an easy, nutritious take-out dinner. (95) We’re celebrating international week at our grocery store. (96) Yesterday’s Italian pasta was a big hit, and if you enjoy spicy food, you’ll definitely want to see what our chefs have prepared for you today. You can try a sample at the counter in aisle nine. The dishes are available in single, double, and family-size portions, for your convenience. (97) When you pick up a meal, you’ll also find some recipe cards included in the package.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các khách hàng xin chú ý. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n \u0111ang tìm ki\u1ebfm gi\u1ea3i pháp cho b\u1eefa \u0103n nhanh, hãy ghé c\u1eeda hàng th\u1ee9c \u0103n ch\u1ebf bi\u1ebfn s\u1eb5n c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec3 có m\u1ed9t b\u1eefa t\u1ed1i mang \u0111i th\u1eadt d\u1ec5 dàng và b\u1ed5 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng. (95) Chúng tôi \u0111ang k\u1ef7 ni\u1ec7m tu\u1ea7n l\u1ec5 qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf t\u1ea1i c\u1eeda hàng. (96) Món mì Ý ngày hôm qua \u0111ã thành công vang d\u1ed9i và n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n thích \u0103n cay, ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd mu\u1ed1n xem nh\u1eefng gì \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111ã chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb cho b\u1ea1n hôm nay. B\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 th\u1eed m\u1ed9t m\u1eabu t\u1ea1i qu\u1ea7y \u1edf l\u1ed1i \u0111i s\u1ed1 chín. Các món \u0103n có s\u1eb5n theo kh\u1ea9u ph\u1ea7n \u0111\u01a1n, \u0111ôi và gia \u0111ình, thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n cho b\u1ea1n. (97) Khi ch\u1ecdn m\u1ed9t b\u1eefa \u0103n, b\u1ea1n c\u0169ng s\u1ebd tìm th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 th\u1ebb công th\u1ee9c có trong gói.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: Welcome to the annual Midwest Landscapers Showcase. This is an opportunity for the region’s landscaping professionals to network and explore the latest innovations in our industry. If you haven’t done so already, (98) don’t forget to take a conference packet from the registration desk. It has all the information you’re going to need. Now, there’s one change to the schedule of today’s events. (99) Our original ten o’clock speaker had to cancel. Instead, Holmdale Systems will be discussing irrigation technology at ten o’clock. Before we get started with the first presentation, (100) I’d like to introduce Rajesh Patel from our conference organizing committee. He’ll talk about how to become a presenter for next year’s conference.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

Chào m\u1eebng b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Tri\u1ec3n lãm C\u1ea3nh quan hàng n\u0103m \u1edf Trung Tây. \u0110ây là c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ec3 các chuyên gia c\u1ea3nh quan c\u1ee7a khu v\u1ef1c k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i và khám phá nh\u1eefng c\u1ea3i ti\u1ebfn m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t trong ngành c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n ch\u01b0a t\u1eebng thamgian, (98) \u0111\u1eebng quên l\u1ea5y tài li\u1ec7u h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb t\u1eeb bàn \u0111\u0103ng ký. Nó có t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 thông tin b\u1ea1n c\u1ea7n. Bây gi\u1edd, có m\u1ed9t thay \u0111\u1ed5i \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi l\u1ecbch trình c\u1ee7a các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n hôm nay. (99) Di\u1ec5n gi\u1ea3 lúc 10 gi\u1edd c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111ã h\u1ee7y tham gia. Thay vào \u0111ó, Holmdale Systems s\u1ebd th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 công ngh\u1ec7 t\u01b0\u1edbi tiêu lúc 10 gi\u1edd. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi chúng ta b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u v\u1edbi bài thuy\u1ebft trình \u0111\u1ea7u tiên, (100) Tôi mu\u1ed1n gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u Rajesh Patel \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb ban t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb s\u1ebd nói v\u1ec1 cách tr\u1edf thành ng\u01b0\u1eddi thuy\u1ebft trình cho h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb n\u0103m sau.<\/p>"}

Information: I’d like to introduce Rajesh Patel from our conference organizing committee.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Incomplete sentences
parts.title: A word or pharse is missing in each of the sentences below. Four answer choices are given below each sentence. Select the best answer to complete the sentence. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
The mother held her newborn ____

childrens.title: —- account will be credited after we receive the returned merchandise.
childrens.answers: ["You","Yours","Your","Yourself"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Your account will be credited after we receive the returned merchandise.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Tài kho\u1ea3n c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn l\u1ea1i ti\u1ec1n sau khi chúng tôi nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hàng tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i.<\/p>

A. You: b\u1ea1n - Danh t\u1eeb (Vai trò: ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef, tân ng\u1eef)<\/p>

B. Yours: c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n - \u0110\u1ea1i t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu (không c\u1ea7n danh t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ee9ng sau)<\/p>

C. Your: c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n - Tính t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu + Danh t\u1eeb<\/p>

D. Yourself: t\u1ef1 b\u1ea3n thân b\u1ea1n - \u0110\u1ea1i t\u1eeb ph\u1ea3n thân <\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Your + account (danh t\u1eeb)<\/p>","en":"

Your account will be credited after we receive the returned merchandise.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. You - Noun: S\/O<\/p>

B. Yours - Possessive Pronoun (without N)<\/p>

C. Your - Possessive Adj + N<\/p>

D. Yourself - Reflexive Prounoun<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Your + account (N)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Late entries for the cake decoration contest will not be ________ .
childrens.answers: ["solved","accepted","decided","earned"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Late entries for the cake decoration contest will not be accepted.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Nh\u1eefng bài thi trang trí bánh kem n\u1ed9p mu\u1ed9n s\u1ebd không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn.<\/p>

A. solved (\u0110T): gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft<\/p>

B. accepted (\u0110T): ch\u1ea5p nh\u1eadn<\/p>

C. decided (\u0110T): quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh<\/p>

D. earned (\u0110T): ki\u1ebfm \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c <\/p>","en":"

Late entries for the cake decoration contest will not be accepted.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. solved - V<\/p>

B. accepted - V<\/p>

C. decided - V<\/p>

D. earned - V<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The newspaper has seen an —– in the number of subscribers who read the online version.
childrens.answers: ["increase","increases","increasingly","increased"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The newspaper has seen an increase in the number of subscribers who read the online version.<\/p>

###<\/p>

S\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u0103ng kí \u0111\u1ecdc báo tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn \u0111ã t\u0103ng lên.<\/p>

A. increase - DT\/\u0110T: s\u1ef1 gia t\u0103ng\/ t\u0103ng<\/p>

B. increases - DT\/\u0110T: s\u1ef1 gia t\u0103ng\/ t\u0103ng<\/p>

C. increasingly - Tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb: ngày càng t\u0103ng<\/p>

D. increased - \u0110T: \u0111ã t\u0103ng lên<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: An + DT (increase)<\/p>","en":"

The newspaper has seen an increase in the number of subscribers who read the online version.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. increase - N\/V<\/p>

B. increases - N\/V<\/p>

C. increasingly - Adv<\/p>

D. increased - V(pp)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: An + N (increase) <\/p>"}

childrens.title: Every attorney at the firm of Duncan and Hulce has practiced law —– more than ten years.
childrens.answers: ["at","for","on","by"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Every attorney at the firm of Duncan and Hulce has practiced law for more than ten years.<\/p>

###<\/p>

M\u1ecdi lu\u1eadt s\u01b0 t\u1ea1i công ty c\u1ee7a Duncan và Hulce \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111ã hành ngh\u1ec1 lu\u1eadt s\u01b0 h\u01a1n m\u01b0\u1eddi n\u0103m.<\/p>

A. at + gi\u1edd<\/p>

B. for + kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian<\/p>

C. on + ngày<\/p>

D. by + m\u1ed1c th\u1eddi gian<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: for + more than ten years (kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian)<\/p>","en":"

Every attorney at the firm of Duncan and Hulce has practiced law for more than ten years.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. at + o'clock<\/p>

B. for + a period of time<\/p>

C. on + day<\/p>

D. by + a timeline<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: for + more than ten years (a period of time)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Prethart Tool Company has created a more —– drill than its previous models.
childrens.answers: ["powerful","powers","powerfully","power"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Prethart Tool Company has created a more powerful drill than its previous models.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Công ty Công c\u1ee5 Prethart \u0111ã t\u1ea1o ra m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc máy khoan m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd h\u01a1n so v\u1edbi các m\u1eabu máy tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây c\u1ee7a nó.<\/p>

A. powerful - Tính t\u1eeb: m\u1ea1nh, \u0111\u1ea7y quy\u1ec1n l\u1ef1c<\/p>

B. powers - DT: S\u1ee9c m\u1ea1nh, quy\u1ec1n l\u1ef1c<\/p>

C. powerfully - Tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb: M\u1ed9t cách m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd<\/p>

D. power - DT: s\u1ee9c m\u1ea1nh, quy\u1ec1n l\u1ef1c<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: a more + Tính t\u1eeb (powerful) + DT (drill)<\/p>","en":"

Prethart Tool Company has created a more powerful drill than its previous models.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. powerful - Adj<\/p>

B. powers - plural N<\/p>

C. powerfully - Adv<\/p>

D. power - Singular N<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: a more + Adj (powerful) + N (drill)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: To find out if an item on this Web site is in stock, —–highlight the item and click the “Check on it” button.
childrens.answers: ["mostly","simply","enough","quite"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

To find out if an item on this Web site is in stock, simply highlight the item and click the “Check on it” button.<\/p>

###<\/p>

\u0110\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft m\u1ed9t m\u1eb7t hàng trên trang Web này còn hàng hay không, ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u m\u1eb7t hàng \u0111ó và nh\u1ea5p vào nút “Ki\u1ec3m tra nó”.<\/p>

A. mostly (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb) + DT: ph\u1ea7n l\u1edbn là<\/p>

B. simply (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb) + \u0110T\/TT: ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n<\/p>

C. enough: \u0111\u1ee7 (TT+ enough\/ enough + DT)<\/p>

D. quite (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb) + TT: khá là<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: simply + highlight (\u0110T)<\/p>","en":"

To find out if an item on this Web site is in stock, simply highlight the item and click the “Check on it” button.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. mostly (adv) + N<\/p>

B. simply (adv) + V\/Adj<\/p>

C. enough (determiner): Adj + enough\/ enough + N<\/p>

D. quite (adv) + adj<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: simply + highlight (V)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Mr. Jones—–Ms. Cheng’s clients while she is on a business trip to Hong Kong.
childrens.answers: ["will assist","assisted","to assist","is assisted"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Mr. Jones will assist Ms. Cheng’s clients while she is on a business trip to Hong Kong.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Ông Jones s\u1ebd h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 các khách hàng c\u1ee7a cô Cheng khi cô \u1ea5y công tác \u1edf H\u1ed3ng Kông<\/p>

A. will assist: s\u1ebd h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3<\/p>

B. assisted: \u0111ã h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3<\/p>

C. to assist: \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3<\/p>

D. is assisted: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: S + will V while S + V (chia hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i)<\/p>","en":"

Mr. Jones will assist Ms. Cheng’s clients while she is on a business trip to Hong Kong.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. will assist: V (future)<\/p>

B. assisted: V (past simple)<\/p>

C. to assist: to V<\/p>

D. is assisted: passive voice<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: S + will V while S + V (simple present tense)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The Jossty Company offers insurance policies to renters at the lowest rates —–.
childrens.answers: ["ready","strong","available","agreeable"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The Jossty Company offers insurance policies to renters at the lowest rates available.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Công ty Jossty cung c\u1ea5p các chính sách b\u1ea3o hi\u1ec3m cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi thuê nhà v\u1edbi m\u1ee9c giá th\u1ea5p nh\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7n có.<\/p>

A. ready (TT): s\u1eb5n sàng<\/p>

B. strong (TT): m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd<\/p>

C. available (TT): có s\u1eb5n, kh\u1ea3 d\u1ee5ng<\/p>

D. agreeable (TT): \u0103n ý<\/p>","en":"

The Jossty Company offers insurance policies to renters at the lowest rates available.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. ready (adj)<\/p>

B. strong (adj)<\/p>

C. available (adj)<\/p>

D. agreeable (adj)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ————— the Editorial Department receives the author’s final approval, the manuscript should be sent to the printer.
childrens.answers: ["As soon as","Still","In the meantime","For example"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

As soon as the Editorial Department receives the author’s final approval, the manuscript should be sent to the printer.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Ngay sau khi B\u1ed9 Biên t\u1eadp nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed3ng ý cu\u1ed1i cùng c\u1ee7a tác gi\u1ea3, b\u1ea3n th\u1ea3o s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eedi \u0111\u1ebfn nhà in.<\/p>

A. As soon as: ngay khi<\/p>

B. Still: v\u1eabn<\/p>

C. In the meantime: trong lúc \u0111ó <\/p>

D. For example: ví d\u1ee5<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Bên c\u1ea1nh phù h\u1ee3p v\u1ec1 ngh\u0129a, \"as soon as\" không có d\u1ea5u ph\u1ea9y \u0111\u1ee9ng sau, 3 t\u1eeb còn l\u1ea1i c\u1ea7n d\u1ea5u ph\u1ea9y.<\/p>","en":"

As soon as the Editorial Department receives the author’s final approval, the manuscript should be sent to the printer.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. As soon as: ngay khi<\/p>

B. Still: v\u1eabn<\/p>

C. In the meantime: trong lúc \u0111ó <\/p>

D. For example: ví d\u1ee5<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Besides the meaning, \"as soon as\" is followed by a comma, the others arenot.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Sidewalks in the town of Newburgh are —- one meter wide.
childrens.answers: ["general","generally","generalize","generalization"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Sidewalks in the town of Newburgh are generally one meter wide.<\/p>

###<\/p>

V\u1ec9a hè \u1edf th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n Newburgh th\u01b0\u1eddng r\u1ed9ng m\u1ed9t mét.<\/p>

A. general (TT): chung, t\u1ed5ng, th\u01b0\u1eddng<\/p>

B. generally (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb): th\u01b0\u1eddng, nhìn chung<\/p>

C. generalize (\u0110T): khái quát<\/p>

D. generalization (DT): s\u1ef1 khái quát<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: C\u1ea5u trúc: Ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef + tobe + tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb + C\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb (tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb dùng b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho c\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb phía sau)<\/p>","en":"

Sidewalks in the town of Newburgh are generally one meter wide.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. general (adj)<\/p>

B. generally (adv)<\/p>

C. generalize (V)<\/p>

D. generalization (N)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: With the structure S + to be + Adv + Noun phrase, you can put an adverb to complement the noun phrase.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The housing authority has formed a —- to look for new construction locations.
childrens.answers: ["member","building","frontier","committee"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The housing authority has formed a committee to look for new construction locations.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. member (N)<\/p>

B. building (N)<\/p>

C. frontier (N)<\/p>

D. committee (N)<\/p>","en":"

The housing authority has formed a committee to look for new construction locations.<\/p>

###<\/p>

C\u01a1 quan nhà \u1edf \u0111ã thành l\u1eadp m\u1ed9t \u1ee7y ban \u0111\u1ec3 tìm ki\u1ebfm v\u1ecb trí xây d\u1ef1ng m\u1edbi.<\/p>

A. member: thành viên<\/p>

B. building: tòa nhà<\/p>

C. frontier: biên gi\u1edbi<\/p>

D. committee: \u1ee7y ban<\/p>"}

childrens.title: A recent study has found that those —- regularly read food labels tend to be healthier.
childrens.answers: ["what","where","who","when"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

A recent study has found that those who regularly read food labels tend to be healthier.<\/p>

###<\/p>

M\u1ed9t nghiên c\u1ee9u g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111ã phát hi\u1ec7n ra r\u1eb1ng nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên \u0111\u1ecdc nhãn th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m có xu h\u01b0\u1edbng kh\u1ecfe m\u1ea1nh h\u01a1n.<\/p>

A. what: cái mà (s\u1ef1 v\u1eadt + what)<\/p>

B. where: n\u01a1i mà (\u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m + where)<\/p>

C. who: ng\u01b0\u1eddi mà (danh t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 ng\u01b0\u1eddi + who)<\/p>

D. when: khi mà (th\u1eddi gian + when)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Those who: nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi mà<\/p>","en":"

A recent study has found that those who regularly read food labels tend to be healthier.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. what: relative pronoun (things + what)<\/p>

B. where: relative pronoun (place +where)<\/p>

C. who: relative pronoun (N_person + who)<\/p>

D. when: relative pronoun (time + when)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Those who = people<\/p>"}

childrens.title: If you are not —- with your Electoshine toothbrush, you may return it for a full refund.
childrens.answers: ["satisfaction","satisfying","satisfied","satisfy"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

If you are not satisfied with your Electoshine toothbrush, you may return it for a full refund.<\/p>

###<\/p>

N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n không hài lòng v\u1edbi bàn ch\u1ea3i \u0111ánh r\u0103ng Electoshine c\u1ee7a mình, b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 tr\u1ea3 l\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn ti\u1ec1n \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7.<\/p>

A. satisfaction (DT): s\u1ef1 hài lòng<\/p>

B. satisfying (TT): hài lòng (khi ch\u1ee7 th\u1ec3 là v\u1eadt)<\/p>

C. satisfied (TT): hài lòng (khi ch\u1ee7 th\u1ec3 là ng\u01b0\u1eddi)<\/p>

D. satisfy (\u0110T): làm hài lòng<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef ch\u1ec9 ng\u01b0\u1eddi (you) + Tobe (are) + Tính t\u1eeb-ed (sastified)<\/p>","en":"

If you are not satisfied with your Electoshine toothbrush, you may return it for a full refund.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. satisfaction (N)<\/p>

B. satisfying (Adj) (S-thing)<\/p>

C. satisfied (Adj) (S-person)<\/p>

D. satisfy (V)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: S-person (you) + Tobe (are) + Adj-ed (sastified)<\/p>"}

childrens.title: DG Feed Supply has shown strong growth heading —– the end of the fiscal year.
childrens.answers: ["among","into","around","between"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

DG Feed Supply has shown strong growth heading into the end of the fiscal year.<\/p>

###<\/p>

B\u01b0\u1edbc vào giai \u0111o\u1ea1n cu\u1ed1i n\u0103m tài chính, DG Feed Supply \u0111ã cho th\u1ea5y m\u1ee9c t\u0103ng tr\u01b0\u1edfng m\u1ea1nh m\u1ebd.<\/p>

A. among: gi\u1eefa (nhi\u1ec1u v\u1eadt\/ nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi)<\/p>

B. into: thành, vào trong<\/p>

C. around: xung quanh<\/p>

D. between: gi\u1eefa (2 v\u1eadt\/ ng\u01b0\u1eddi)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Heading into: b\u01b0\u1edbc vào 1 giai \u0111o\u1ea1n\/ s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n nào \u0111ó<\/p>","en":"

DG Feed Supply has shown strong growth heading into the end of the fiscal year.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. among<\/p>

B. into<\/p>

C. around<\/p>

D. between (N1 and N2)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Heading into = enter an event or a period of time<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Book fair volunteers may be asked to work longer shifts if the need ——– .
childrens.answers: ["arise","arises","had arisen","arising"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Book fair volunteers may be asked to work longer shifts if the need arises.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Nh\u1eefng tình nguy\u1ec7n viên h\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 sách có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u làm vi\u1ec7c lâu h\u01a1n n\u1ebfu có nhu câu phát sinh.<\/p>

A. arise: phát sinh<\/p>

B. arises: phát sinh<\/p>

C. had arisen: \u0111ã phát sinh<\/p>

D. arsing: \u0111ang phát sinh<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Câu \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n lo\u1ea1i 1: If S + V(s,es), S + will\/may V<\/p>","en":"

Book fair volunteers may be asked to work longer shifts if the need arises.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Nh\u1eefng tình nguy\u1ec7n viên h\u1ed9i ch\u1ee3 sách có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u làm vi\u1ec7c lâu h\u01a1n n\u1ebfu có nhu câu phát sinh.<\/p>

A. arise (v)<\/p>

B. arises (v)<\/p>

C. had arisen (v)<\/p>

D. arsing (v-ing)<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Conditional sentence type 1: If S + V(s,es), S + will\/may V<\/p>"}

childrens.title: On Tuesday, Mr. Molina will visit the Seoul office for the first time ——- becoming vice-president of operations.
childrens.answers: ["under","past","until","since"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

On Tuesday, Mr. Molina will visit the Seoul office for the first time since becoming vice-president of operations.<\/p>

###<\/p>

Vào th\u1ee9 ba, ông Molina s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng Seoul l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi tr\u1edf thành phó ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a công ty.<\/p>

A. under: d\u01b0\u1edbi <\/p>

B. past: quá kh\u1ee9<\/p>

C. until: Cho \u0111\u1ebfn khi + Th\u1eddi gian\/ M\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1<\/p>

D. since: k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi + Ving\/ M\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1\/ \u0110i\u1ec3m th\u1eddi gian<\/p>

###<\/p>

Gi\u1ea3i thích: Since + Ving (becoming)<\/p>","en":"

On Tuesday, Mr. Molina will visit the Seoul office for the first time since becoming vice-president of operations.<\/p>

###<\/p>

A. under (adv)<\/p>

B. past (N)<\/p>

C. until (conjunction\/ prep) + clause\/ time<\/p>

D. since (prep\/ conjunction) + Ving\/ clause\/ time<\/p>

###<\/p>

Explanation: Since + Ving (becoming)<\/p>"}

parts.name: Text completion
parts.title: Read the texts that follow. A word or pharse is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

questions.text_read:
From: Janine Farber
To: Barker Marketing Group employees
Date: September 25
Subject: Entryway improvements
As many of you have noticed, the main entrance of
our building is in ---1--- condition. It is in
desperate need of attention. Therefore, beginning at
6 P.M. on Friday, the main entrance ---2--- for
approximately one month as it is renovated. The
changes will give the entryway a more streamlined
and contemporary appearance.
---3--- the main entrance is closed, employees
and visitors may use the side entrances to gain
access to the building. ---4---.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi g\u1eedi: Janine Farber
Kính g\u1eedi: Nhân viên Barker Marketing Group
Ngày: 25 tháng 9
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: C\u1ea3i ti\u1ebfn l\u1ed1i vào
Nh\u01b0 nhi\u1ec1u b\u1ea1n \u0111ã nh\u1eadn th\u1ea5y, l\u1ed1i vào chính c\u1ee7a tòa nhà chúng ta \u0111ang \u1edf trong tình tr\u1ea1ng xu\u1ed1ng c\u1ea5p. V\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này \u0111ang r\u1ea5t c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c quan tâm. Do \u0111ó, b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb 6 gi\u1edd t\u1ed1i th\u1ee9 Sáu, l\u1ed1i vào chính s\u1ebd \u0111óng c\u1eeda trong kho\u1ea3ng m\u1ed9t tháng \u0111\u1ec3 tân trang l\u1ea1i. Nh\u1eefng thay \u0111\u1ed5i s\u1ebd mang l\u1ea1i cho l\u1ed1i vào m\u1ed9t di\u1ec7n m\u1ea1o hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i và h\u1ee3p lý h\u01a1n. Trong khi l\u1ed1i vào chính b\u1ecb \u0111óng, nhân viên và khách có th\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng l\u1ed1i vào ph\u1ee5 \u0111\u1ec3 vào tòa nhà. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các v\u0103n phòng \u1edf t\u1ea7ng tr\u1ec7t v\u1eabn có th\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
(May 2) – Automotive-manufacturing company Lybera, Inc., today announced that Harvey Ramirez has been appointed as the new chairperson of its board of directors. He ---1--- Helen McGavick, who has resigned in order to pursue a new business venture.

“We thank Ms. McGavick for her service and wish her success in her ---2--- endeavors,” said Fen Wang, Lybera’s president and CEO.

Mr. Ramirez has spent ten years as CEO of aerospace-engineering firm Elia Aviation. ---3---, he held a variety of senior management roles across public and private sectors.

“Mr. Ramirez’s familiarity with sophisticated technology, combined with his leadership experience, makes him well suited to lead our company,” said Mr. Wang. “---4---.”
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

(02\/05) - Công ty s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ô tô Lybera, Inc., thông báo r\u1eb1ng Harvey Ramirez \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ed5 nhi\u1ec7m làm ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng qu\u1ea3n tr\u1ecb. Ông thay th\u1ebf Helen McGavick - ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã t\u1eeb ch\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ec3 theo \u0111u\u1ed5i m\u1ed9t d\u1ef1 án kinh doanh m\u1edbi.<\/p>

“Chúng tôi c\u1ea3m \u01a1n cô McGavick vì nh\u1eefng c\u1ed1ng hi\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y và chúc cô \u1ea5y thành công trong nh\u1eefng n\u1ed7 l\u1ef1c trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai,” Fen Wang, ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch kiêm Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành c\u1ee7a Lybera phát bi\u1ec3u.<\/p>

Ông Ramirez \u0111ã có m\u01b0\u1eddi n\u0103m làm Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0111i\u1ec1u hành c\u1ee7a công ty k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt hàng không v\u0169 tr\u1ee5 Elia Aviation. Tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây, ông t\u1eebng \u0111\u1ea3m nhi\u1ec7m nhi\u1ec1u vai trò qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ea5p cao trong các l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c công và t\u01b0.<\/p>

\"Ông Ramirez có nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi công ngh\u1ec7 ph\u1ee9c t\u1ea1p k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi kinh nghi\u1ec7m lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o nên r\u1ea5t phù h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ec3 lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o công ty c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, ”ông Wang nói. “Chúng tôi mong ch\u1edd s\u1ef1 h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn c\u1ee7a ông \u1ea5y”.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
25 February
Dear Ms. Nguyen,
We appreciate your feedback regarding Medusa Airways’ flight 859, which was scheduled to depart at 9:35 A.M. on 19 February. We are sorry that this flight ---1---. We have decided to compensate you for the ---2---. We have refunded the unused portion of your ticket, valued at $410. Also, we will reimburse the $200 you paid in hotel charges resulting ---3--- the disruption. ---4---. Please allow up to five business days for the transactions to process.

Sincerely,

Yeeking Lai Customer Relations Manager
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

25 tháng 2
Cô Nguy\u1ec5n thân m\u1ebfn,
Chúng tôi \u0111ánh giá cao ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i c\u1ee7a cô v\u1ec1 chuy\u1ebfn bay 859 c\u1ee7a Medusa Airways, d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn kh\u1edfi hành lúc 9:35 sáng ngày 19\/2. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t ti\u1ebfc vì chuy\u1ebfn bay này \u0111ã b\u1ecb h\u1ee7y. Chúng tôi \u0111ã quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh b\u1ed3i th\u01b0\u1eddng cho cô vì s\u1ef1 b\u1ea5t ti\u1ec7n này. Chúng tôi \u0111ã hoàn l\u1ea1i ph\u1ea7n vé ch\u01b0a s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng c\u1ee7a cô, tr\u1ecb giá $ 410. Ngoài ra, chúng tôi s\u1ebd hoàn tr\u1ea3 200 \u0111ô la mà cô \u0111ã thanh toán phí khách s\u1ea1n do s\u1ef1 gián \u0111o\u1ea1n. C\u1ea3 hai kho\u1ea3n ti\u1ec1n \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ghi vào tài kho\u1ea3n c\u1ee7a cô. Vui lòng \u0111\u1ee3i t\u1ed1i \u0111a n\u0103m ngày làm vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1ec3 x\u1eed lý các giao d\u1ecbch.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Yeeking Lai Giám \u0111\u1ed1c quan h\u1ec7 khách hàng<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
To: Film crew
From: Sandeep Goswami
Date: Monday, October 2
Subject: Barn scene retake

Dear Crew,

This is reminder that on Saturday we will be doing a retake of the advertisement featuring the horses at Willow Stables. Filming with animals can be unpredictable, and last week we were not able to get the footage we needed. ---1---, I would like to begin promptly at 8:00 A.M. so that we can film from a number of angles before lunch. As long as everyone is punctual and everything goes well, we should get the footage we needed by then. ---2---.
I also want to ---3--- the fact that the set is closed to all who are not absolutely essential to the filming of the scene. Anyone else will be too much of a ---4---.

Sandeep Goswami
Monarda Productions
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Kính g\u1eedi: \u0110oàn làm phim
Ng\u01b0\u1eddi g\u1eedi: Sandeep Goswami
Ngày: Th\u1ee9 Hai, ngày 2 tháng 10
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: C\u1ea3nh quay l\u1ea1i chu\u1ed3ng tr\u1ea1i<\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi \u0111oàn phim,<\/p>

\u0110ây là l\u1eddi nh\u1eafc r\u1eb1ng vào th\u1ee9 B\u1ea3y, chúng tôi s\u1ebd th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n l\u1ea1i qu\u1ea3ng cáo v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng chú ng\u1ef1a \u1edf Willow Stables. Vi\u1ec7c quay phim v\u1edbi \u0111\u1ed9ng v\u1eadt không th\u1ec3 \u0111oán tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c và tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc chúng tôi \u0111ã không có \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1ea3nh quay mà chúng tôi c\u1ea7n. N\u1ebfu có th\u1ec3, tôi mu\u1ed1n b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u ngay lúc 8 gi\u1edd sáng \u0111\u1ec3 chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 quay m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 góc tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi \u0103n tr\u01b0a. Mi\u1ec5n là m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111úng gi\u1edd và m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 di\u1ec5n ra t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1eb9p, chúng tôi s\u1ebd có \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eefng c\u1ea3nh quay mà chúng tôi c\u1ea7n vào lúc \u0111ó. Tuy nhiên, nó có th\u1ec3 m\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 ngày.
Tôi c\u0169ng mu\u1ed1n nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh r\u1eb1ng tr\u01b0\u1eddng quay \u0111óng c\u1eeda v\u1edbi t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng ai không ph\u1eadn s\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ec3 quay c\u1ea3nh này. B\u1edfi h\u1ecd s\u1ebd gây phân tâm cho \u0111oàn phim.<\/p>

Sandeep Goswami
Monarda Productions<\/p>"}

Explanation: As long as everyone is punctual and everything goes well, we should get the footage we needed by then.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Reading comprehension
parts.title: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magezine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
Are you someone who enjoys trying new things and does not feel uncomfortable in new environment? Then why not get paid for it? CULTURE magazine is looking for individuals to go to ne

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Kính th\u01b0a khách hàng: Trong nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m, chúng tôi t\u1ea1i Star Designs \u0111ã n\u1ed7 l\u1ef1c không ng\u1eebng \u0111\u1ec3 cung c\u1ea5p nh\u1eefng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m may m\u1eb7c ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng v\u1edbi giá c\u1ea3 c\u1ea1nh tranh. Th\u1eadt không may, khi xem qua các c\u1eeda hàng tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a mình, g\u1ea7n \u0111ây chúng tôi \u0111ã bu\u1ed9c ph\u1ea3i t\u0103ng giá. Chúng tôi \u0111ã r\u1ea5t n\u1ed7 l\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ec3 tránh vi\u1ec7c t\u0103ng giá, nh\u01b0ng do chi phí ngày càng t\u0103ng c\u1ee7a bông và h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các lo\u1ea1i v\u1ea3i mà chúng tôi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u1ec3 may áo s\u01a1 mi s\u1eb7c s\u1ee1 và qu\u1ea7n áo trang tr\u1ecdng, chúng tôi không còn \u0111\u1ee7 kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng \u0111\u1ec3 duy trì m\u1ee9c giá nh\u01b0 c\u0169. Tuy nhiên, chúng tôi s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c cung c\u1ea5p ch\u1ea5t l\u01b0\u1ee3ng tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi và ph\u01b0\u01a1ng pháp ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn h\u01b0\u1edbng \u0111\u1ebfn khách hàng mà b\u1ea1n \u0111ã \u0111ánh giá cao Star Designs. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n s\u1ef1 c\u1ea3m thông và \u0111\u1ed3ng hành c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n!<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Acadetech
H\u01a1n m\u01b0\u1eddi n\u0103m ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 cá nhân và các doanh nghi\u1ec7p v\u1eeba và nh\u1ecf
Chúng tôi làm gì:
• Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf trang web \u0111áp \u1ee9ng v\u1edbi ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed an toàn
• Phát tri\u1ec3n và qu\u1ea3n lý n\u1ed9i dung \u0111a ngôn ng\u1eef
• Xây d\u1ef1ng th\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7u và ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb
Giá b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb $ 2 (K) cho trang web n\u0103m trang c\u01a1 b\u1ea3n b\u1eb1ng ti\u1ebfng Anh. Thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf nhanh có s\u1eb5n. G\u1ecdi ho\u1eb7c e-mail cho chúng tôi ngay hôm nay \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u01b0 v\u1ea5n!
Ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i khách hàng:
“Công vi\u1ec7c kinh doanh c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111ã kh\u1edfi s\u1eafc k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi ra m\u1eaft trang web m\u1edbi tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi do ông Alexander thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf, các công c\u1ee5 th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed siêu b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt giúp khách hàng c\u1ee7a tôi mua s\u1eafm d\u1ec5 dàng và an toàn”.
Julia Melo, Flowers to go
“Acadctech là t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t! Tôi c\u1ea7n ti\u1ebfp xúc v\u1edbi nhi\u1ec1u khách hàng khác nhau và h\u1ecd \u0111\u1ec1u l\u1eafng nghe. Nh\u1edd thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111áp \u1ee9ng c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd, trang web c\u1ee7a tôi ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 trên \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i di \u0111\u1ed9ng và máy tính b\u1ea3ng c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 trên màn hình máy tính \u0111\u1ec3 bàn l\u1edbn ”.
Erik Schroeder, Jamestown Catering<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1edbi: Geoffrey Breen
T\u1eeb: Gagan Chopra
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Thông tin
Ngày: 24 tháng 3
T\u1ec7p \u0111ính kèm: 10 Chopra I
Geoffrey thân m\u1ebfn:
Tôi mu\u1ed1n nh\u1eafc r\u1eb1ng b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb th\u1ee9 Hai t\u1edbi, tôi s\u1ebd \u0111i ngh\u1ec9 ba tu\u1ea7n \u1edf Jaipur. Tôi \u0111ang cung c\u1ea5p cho b\u1ea1n danh sách các d\u1ef1 án sách hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i mà tôi \u0111ang giám sát, bao g\u1ed3m ngày h\u1ebft h\u1ea1n b\u1ea3n th\u1ea3o c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 các thông tin thích h\u1ee3p khác v\u1ec1 t\u1eebng d\u1ef1 án. Tôi bi\u1ebft khi là t\u1ed5ng biên t\u1eadp b\u1ea1n có r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u vi\u1ec7c ph\u1ea3i làm, vì v\u1eady tôi \u0111ã nh\u1edd m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p giám sát các d\u1ef1 án c\u1ee7a tôi khi tôi \u0111i v\u1eafng.
Ian Pressler \u0111ã luôn làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi tôi trong vài tháng qua v\u1ec1 các l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c du l\u1ecbch và tài chính, vì v\u1eady anh \u1ea5y bi\u1ebft rõ v\u1ec1 các d\u1ef1 án \u0111ang di\u1ec5n ra trong l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c này và m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 s\u1ebd di\u1ec5n ra suôn s\u1ebb. Chúng tôi \u0111ã có m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp \u0103n tr\u01b0a ngày hôm qua t\u1ea1i nhà hàng m\u1edbi g\u1ea7n Ch\u1ee3 Anderson \u0111\u1ec3 xem qua chúng. Khi \u1edf \u0111ó, chúng tôi \u0111\u01b0a ra m\u1ed9t danh sách d\u1ef1 án, bao g\u1ed3m t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 liên quan. Tôi s\u1ebd b\u1ecb h\u1ea1n ch\u1ebf truy c\u1eadp Internet khi \u0111i du l\u1ecbch, nh\u01b0ng tôi s\u1ebd tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi tin nh\u1eafn nhanh nh\u1ea5t có th\u1ec3.
Trân tr\u1ecdng.
Gagan Chopra<\/p>"}

{"vn":"

Thông tin:  We had a lunch meeting yesterday at the new restaurant near Anderson Market to go over them.<\/p>

Soraya Channa 8:45 sáng
Chào, Ru. Tôi ph\u1ea3i \u0111ón các th\u1ef1c t\u1eadp sinh marketing m\u1edbi vào lúc 9:00 và b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u bu\u1ed5i \u0111ào t\u1ea1o \u0111\u1ea7u tiên, nh\u01b0ng tàu c\u1ee7a tôi ch\u1ec9 v\u1eeba m\u1edbi r\u1eddi ga.
Ru Liao 8:46 A.M.
Chuy\u1ec7n gì \u0111ã x\u1ea3y ra?
Soraya Channa 8:47 A.M.
Tôi ngh\u0129 do th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft nên b\u1ecb ch\u1eadm tr\u1ec5. Có l\u1ebd có b\u0103ng trên \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng ray? Dù sao tôi c\u0169ng s\u1ebd không th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn v\u0103n phòng k\u1ecbp gi\u1edd.
ZRu Liao 8:48 A.M
Ok. Trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p \u0111ó, tôi s\u1ebd chào h\u1ecfi các sinh viên th\u1ef1c t\u1eadp và d\u1eabn d\u1eaft bu\u1ed5i h\u1ecdc \u0111\u1ea7u tiên, và b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 tham gia v\u1edbi chúng tôi khi b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn. Sau \u0111ó, b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 d\u1eabn d\u1eaft phiên nghiên c\u1ee9u nhân kh\u1ea9u h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a chúng tôi vào bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ec1u.
Soraya Channa 8:49 sáng
Vâng, v\u1eady thì h\u1ee3p lý h\u01a1n. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n!<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

PRESTON (29 tháng 8) — Ngày càng nhi\u1ec1u các ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng kinh doanh nh\u1ecf c\u1ee7a th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n t\u1ea1o ra nhi\u1ec1u vi\u1ec7c làm m\u1edbi và c\u1ee7ng c\u1ed1 th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng. Trên th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf, các doanh nghi\u1ec7p nh\u1ecf c\u1ee7a Preston \u0111ã tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng 4.300 ng\u01b0\u1eddi vào n\u0103m ngoái, b\u1eb1ng 25% l\u1ef1c l\u01b0\u1ee3ng lao \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng.
Ti\u1ebfn s\u0129 Henry Belanger, ng\u01b0\u1eddi d\u1ea1y tài chính t\u1ea1i \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Lackland, gi\u1ea3i thích: “Các doanh nghi\u1ec7p nh\u1ecf ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn là \u0111\u1ed9ng l\u1ef1c kinh t\u1ebf quan tr\u1ecdng. \"Các doanh nghi\u1ec7p m\u1edbi thành l\u1eadp là m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 quan tr\u1ecdng \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o vi\u1ec7c làm.\"
Theo ông Belanger, Preston là m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n c\u1ee7a xu h\u01b0\u1edbng m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng donh nghi\u1ec7p toàn t\u1ec9nh.
Ti\u1ebfn s\u0129 Belanger cho bi\u1ebft: “N\u0103m ngoái, t\u1ec9nh \u0111ã ch\u1ee9ng ki\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng vi\u1ec7c làm trên m\u1ee9c trung bình c\u1ee7a c\u1ea3 n\u01b0\u1edbc, thêm h\u01a1n 19.000 vi\u1ec7c làm t\u1ed5ng th\u1ec3.” Kho\u1ea3ng 17% là trong các doanh nghi\u1ec7p nh\u1ecf. H\u01a1n n\u1eefa, nh\u1edd thu nh\u1eadp cá nhân do các công ty nh\u1ecf t\u1ea1o ra, các doanh nghi\u1ec7p l\u1edbn h\u01a1n, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thành l\u1eadp c\u0169ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u01b0\u1edfng l\u1ee3i ”.
Các bên quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c kh\u1edfi s\u1ef1 kinh doanh có th\u1ec3 truy c\u1eadp Trung tâm Doanh nghi\u1ec7p T\u1ec9nh Nh\u1ecf l\u1ebb c\u1ee7a chính ph\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u1ee3 giúp trong vi\u1ec7c l\u1eadp k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch kinh doanh, tìm ki\u1ebfm v\u1ed1n và h\u1ecdc các chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb.<\/p>"}

childrens.answers: ["The government has opened a new office to help them.","Their impact extends to larger organizations.","They provide inexperienced employees with training.","They are closing throughout the province."]

Ông Belanger nói gì v\u1ec1 các doanh nghi\u1ec7p nh\u1ecf?<\/p>

A. Chính ph\u1ee7 \u0111ã m\u1edf m\u1ed9t v\u0103n phòng m\u1edbi \u0111\u1ec3 giúp \u0111\u1ee1 h\u1ecd<\/p>

B. \u1ea2nh h\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ee7a chúng góp ph\u1ea7n m\u1edf ra các t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c l\u1edbn h\u01a1n<\/p>

Thông tin: Moreover, thanks to the personal income generated by small companies, larger, established businesses benefited too.<\/p>","en":"

B. Their impact extends to larger organizations.<\/p>

C. They provide inexperienced employees with training.<\/p>

D. They are closing throughout the province.<\/p>

Information: Moreover, thanks to the personal income generated by small companies, larger, established businesses benefited too. <\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1edbi: dianepaxton@lamail.com
T\u1eeb: customerervice@lenfordhnancial.co.uk
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Tài kho\u1ea3n Tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn
Ngày: 22 tháng 6<\/p>

G\u1eedi cô Paxton,
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã quan tâm \u0111\u1ebfn Lenford Financial. Chúng tôi \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n và \u0111ã c\u1ea5p tên ng\u01b0\u1eddi dùng và m\u1eadt kh\u1ea9u t\u1ea1m th\u1eddi. \u0110\u1ec3 kích ho\u1ea1t tài kho\u1ea3n tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n, vui lòng làm theo các b\u01b0\u1edbc sau.
1. Truy c\u1eadp trang web c\u1ee7a chúng tôi và ch\u1ecdn “\u0110\u0103ng ký m\u1edbi”.
2. \u0110\u0103ng nh\u1eadp b\u1eb1ng tên ng\u01b0\u1eddi dùng DPAXTON và m\u1eadt kh\u1ea9u XA098T. B\u1ea1n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eafc t\u1ea1o tên ng\u01b0\u1eddi dùng và m\u1eadt kh\u1ea9u m\u1edbi.
3. M\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c kh\u1ea3o sát khách hàng m\u1edbi s\u1ebd b\u1eadt lên. \u0110i\u1ec1n vào b\u1ea3n kh\u1ea3o sát v\u1edbi thông tin v\u1ec1 h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 tài chính c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.
4. Sau khi b\u1ea1n g\u1eedi b\u1ea3n kh\u1ea3o sát, m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n v\u1ec1 tài kho\u1ea3ns\u1ebd g\u1ecdi cho b\u1ea1n trong vòng 24 gi\u1edd \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 danh m\u1ee5c các kho\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.
Chúng tôi mong mu\u1ed1n giúp b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ea1t \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ee5c tiêu tài chính c\u1ee7a mình.
Kent Rawlin
\u0110\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n tài kho\u1ea3n khách hàng<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Green Rock Tìm ki\u1ebfm Tr\u1ee3 lý cho Phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m Công ngh\u1ec7
Vì nhu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a sinh viên, Phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m Công ngh\u1ec7 c\u1ee7a \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Green Rock hi\u1ec7n s\u1ebd m\u1edf c\u1eeda vào bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ec1u t\u1ed1i. Do nghiên c\u1ee9u kéo dài, chúng tôi \u0111ang tìm ki\u1ebfm m\u1ed9t tr\u1ee3 lý phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ec1u t\u1ed1i. \u1ee8ng viên lý t\u01b0\u1edfng là ng\u01b0\u1eddi có nhi\u1ec1u ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c và k\u1ef9 n\u0103ng liên quan v\u1ec1 in 3-D, mã hóa c\u01a1 b\u1ea3n, các ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed3 h\u1ecda và ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m làm phim.
Chúng tôi \u0111ang tìm ki\u1ebfm m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi kiên nh\u1eabn, sáng t\u1ea1o và thích giúp \u0111\u1ee1 ng\u01b0\u1eddi khác. \u1ee8ng viên lý t\u01b0\u1edfng c\u0169ng s\u1ebd thích h\u1ecdc nh\u1eefng \u0111i\u1ec1u m\u1edbi và chia s\u1ebb ki\u1ebfn th\u1ee9c \u0111ó v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi khác. Các \u1ee9ng viên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ecdn \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c yêu c\u1ea7u \u0111\u01b0a ra các ví d\u1ee5 v\u1ec1 các d\u1ef1 án liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn công ngh\u1ec7 mà h\u1ecd \u0111ã làm vi\u1ec7c và nên chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 các d\u1ef1 án \u0111ó. \u1ee8ng viên quan tâm nên g\u1eedi th\u01b0 quan tâm và lý l\u1ecbch \u0111\u1ebfn tech@greenrockuniversity.edu.<\/p>"}
